hibernate-mapping.sql-query: insert into EO_WORK_ITEM (EOWI_ID, CREATOR, CREATE_TIME, MODIFIER, MODIFY_TIME, REC_VER, REC_STATUS, ORG_ID, PM_CODE, EOWI_WORK_ORDER_NO, EOWI_CODE, EOWI_NAME, EOWI_PACKAGE_TYPE_CODE, EOWI_PACKAGE_TYPE_NAME, EOWI_PACKAGE_UNIT_CODE, EOWI_PACKAGE_UNIT_NAME, EOWI_ITEM_TYPE_CODE, EOWI_ITEM_TYPE_NAME, EOWI_PACKAGE_QUANTITY, EOWI_QUANTITY, EOWI_GROSS_WEIGHT, EOWI_NET_WEIGHT, EOWI_VOLUME, EOWI_LOT_NO, EOWI_PRICE, EOWI_AMOUNT, EOWI_TEMPERATURE_LEVEL_CODE, EOWI_TEMPERATURE_LEVEL_NAME, EOWI_TEMPERATURE_FM, EOWI_TEMPERATURE_TO, EOWI_PRODUCTION_DATE, EOWI_REMARK, EOWI_LOTATT01, EOWI_LOTATT02, EOWI_LOTATT03, EOWI_LOTATT04, EOWI_LOTATT05, EOWI_LOTATT06, EOWI_LOTATT07, EOWI_LOTATT08, EOWI_LOTATT09, EOWI_LOTATT10, EOWI_LOTATT11, EOWI_LOTATT12, EOWI_ALLOCATED_QTY, EOWI_SIGN_QTY) select SEQ_EO_WORK_ITEM.NEXTVAL, /*EOWI_ID*/ EOWO.CREATOR, /*CREATOR*/ SYSDATE, /*CREATE_TIME*/ EOWO.MODIFIER, /*MODIFIER*/ SYSDATE, /*MODIFY_TIME*/ 0, /*REC_VER*/ 0, /*REC_STATUS*/ EOOI.ORG_ID, /*ORG_ID*/ EOOI.PM_CODE, /*PM_CODE*/ EOWO.EOWO_WORK_ORDER_NO, /*EOWI_WORK_ORDER_NO*/ EOOI.EOOI_CODE, EOOI.EOOI_NAME, EOOI.EOOI_PACKAGE_TYPE_CODE, EOOI.EOOI_PACKAGE_TYPE_NAME, EOOI.EOOI_PACKAGE_UNIT_CODE, EOOI.EOOI_PACKAGE_UNIT_NAME, EOOI.EOOI_ITEM_TYPE_CODE, EOOI.EOOI_ITEM_TYPE_NAME, EOOI.EOOI_PACKAGE_QUANTITY, EOOI.EOOI_QUANTITY, EOOI.EOOI_GROSS_WEIGHT, EOOI.EOOI_NET_WEIGHT, EOOI.EOOI_VOLUME, EOOI.EOOI_LOT_NO, EOOI.EOOI_PRICE, EOOI.EOOI_AMOUNT, EOOI.EOOI_TEMPERATURE_LEVEL_CODE, EOOI.EOOI_TEMPERATURE_LEVEL_NAME, EOOI.EOOI_TEMPERATURE_FM, EOOI.EOOI_TEMPERATURE_TO, EOOI.EOOI_PRODUCTION_DATE, EOOI.EOOI_REMARK, EOOI.EOOI_LOTATT01, EOOI.EOOI_LOTATT02, EOOI.EOOI_LOTATT03, EOOI.EOOI_LOTATT04, EOOI.EOOI_LOTATT05, EOOI.EOOI_LOTATT06, EOOI.EOOI_LOTATT07, EOOI.EOOI_LOTATT08, EOOI.EOOI_LOTATT09, EOOI.EOOI_LOTATT10, EOOI.EOOI_LOTATT11, EOOI.EOOI_LOTATT12, EOOI.EOOI_ALLOCATED_QTY, EOOI.EOOI_SIGN_QTY from EO_ORDER_ITEM EOOI left join EO_WORK_ORDER EOWO on EOWO.EOWO_ORDER_NO = EOOI.EOOI_ORDER_NO and EOWO.ORG_ID = EOOI.ORG_ID where EOOI.EOOI_ORDER_NO = :eoorOrderNo and EOOI.ORG_ID = :orgId
